item.title: There was a dead fox on my drive, 15th September
item.description:
I’ve put it in a bag and is currently residing in my general waste bin outside my front door. 15 Crockham way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crockham Way, Coldharbour, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, smashed window., 15th September
item.description:
This car has been parked here, opposite Wm Patten School, for a week. The window on the passenger side has been smashed in, someone local has covered it for them, however rain has got inside the car.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London

item.title: New tree request please, 15th September

item.title: Window fell off from Council owned building, 15th September
item.description:
One of the top floor windows of the Council owned building at 77 Westbourne Terrace fell on the pavement of Chilworth Street, where there now is a window and broken glass. Very lucky no one was seriously injured, or worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Westbourne Terrace, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Motorbike parked on pavement, 15th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 285, City Road, Islington, London

item.title: Filled bins with domestic waste., 15th September
item.description:
The bin on this green space is being used to dump someone's domestic waste. As soon as Bexley Street cleaners empty this bin, it's filled within 24/48 hours. Because the bin is filled, waste is now overflowing onto the grass.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): FP82, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
